name: Karen LAUB, Appellant, v. Stanley ZASLAVSKY

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDermott, zappala and papadakos, jj.
parties: Karen LAUB, Appellant, v. Stanley ZASLAVSKY.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Order affirmed.
LARSEN and McDERMOTT, JJ., dissent.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Joel E. Oshtry, Norman A. Oshtry, Philadelphia, for appellant.
John A. Kane, Chief Counsel, Mary B. Seiverling, Asst. Counsel, Harrisburg, for amicus curiae, Comm., Dept, of Public Welfare, Bureau of Child Support Enforcement.
Dennis P. Talty, Philadelphia, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
565 A.2d 158
Karen LAUB, Appellant, v. Stanley ZASLAVSKY.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Oct. 24, 1989.
Decided Nov. 1, 1989.
Joel E. Oshtry, Norman A. Oshtry, Philadelphia, for appellant.
John A. Kane, Chief Counsel, Mary B. Seiverling, Asst. Counsel, Harrisburg, for amicus curiae, Comm., Dept, of Public Welfare, Bureau of Child Support Enforcement.
Dennis P. Talty, Philadelphia, for appellee.
Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDermott, zappala and papadakos, jj.
